Connect to Office 365
Disconnect
Hi\u00A0
\nYou\'re now connected to Office 365. Tap the mail icon below to send a message from your account using the Microsoft Graph API.\n
\nCheck your inbox. You have a new message :)
Connected to Office 365
Found Office 365 mail service
Mail sent
Disconnected from Office 365
Oops!
\nSorry, can\'t connect to Office 365.\nHint: Check logcat for details.
\nSorry, can\'t find the mail service.\nHint: Check logcat for details.
\nSorry, can\'t send the email.\nHint: Check logcat for details.
Error connecting to Office 365\nCheck logcat for details

Error sending email\nCheck logcat for details
The client ID or redirect URI is not valid. Enter a valid client ID and redirect URI in the Constants.java file and run again
juan.guerrero@avantica.net
Welcome to Microsoft Graph development on Android with the Connect sample

Congratulations, {0}!

This is a message from the Microsoft Graph Connect sample. You are well on your way to incorporating Microsoft services in your apps.

What’s next?

  • Check out graph.microsoft.io to start building Microsoft Graph apps today with all the latest tools, templates, and guidance to get started quickly.
  • Use the Graph Explorer to start your testing.
  • Browse other samples on GitHub to see more of the APIs in action.

Give us feedback

  • If you have any trouble running this sample, please log an issue.
  • For general questions about the Microsoft Graph APIs, post to Stack Overflow. Make sure that your questions or comments are tagged with [MicrosoftGraph].

Thanks, and happy coding!
    Your Microsoft Graph Development team

See on GitHub Suggest on UserVoice Share on Twitter
